name: market for wheat flour | wheat flour | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21724/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'wheat flour', in the geography of South Africa.;This dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of wheat flour from the whole wheat processing facility (mill) to the associated market. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'wheat flour' is from dry-milled wheat. Wheat is an annual crop.

The activity starts at the mill gate.

The activity ends with the provision of wheat flour at the associated market.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/106:Manufacture of grain mill products, starches and starch products/1061:Manufacture of grain mill products

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data represents the South African context.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes in South Africa.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data is primarily sourced from literature and statistics.

exchanges.description: Imports of wheat flour for local consumption is considered negligible (0.04% in 2015/16) (SAGIS, 2016). The transport distance is calculated based on the breakdown of the wheat processing and consumption by province. SAGIS (2016) reports wheat processing by province. See documentation for further information.
